title: onyx-ai values
description: JSON Schema for onyx-ai Helm chart values

variant.description: Which Onyx variant to deploy (affects container images)

global.description: Global values accessible to all charts

storageClass.description: Storage class for persistent volumes (empty = cluster default)

onyx.description: Upstream Onyx chart configuration (passthrough). See https://github.com/onyx-dot-app/onyx for options.
